Dialog 1

Te'si-gisg'g, tugwiei.

Every morning, I wake up.

N'npoqoneg elisin.

I am lying in my bed.

Toqo-jiw men'ja'si.

Then I get up.

Toqo-jiw gesispa'lsi.

Then I wash myself.

Toqo-jiw geg'na'si.

Then I get dressed.

Gisgna'si, na tujiw wissugwai.

After I get dressed, then I cook for myself.

Mijji; ilaji ugjit natlugwen. Aq natlugwei. Eliei Listugujg. Na'te'l etllugwei.

I eat; I get ready to go to work. And I go to work. I go to Listuguj. There is where I work.

Toqo-jiw pegisin ta'n etllugwei.

Then I arrive where I work.

Toqo-jiw poqtlugwei.

Then I start to work.

Ta'n tujiw gispnei na atlasmi.

When I get tired, then I rest.

Toqo-jiw mijji.

Then I eat.

Toqo-jiw apatlugwei.

Then I go back to work.

Ta'n tujiw gaqlugwei, na enmiei.

When I finish work, then I go home.

Toqo-jiw pegisin nignaq.

Then I arrive home [lit. 'at our house'].

Toqo-jiw poqji-wissugwatigei.

Then I start to cook.

Toqo-jiw app mijji.

Then I eat again.

Ta'n tujiw g's'tal, na getugsiei.

When I have eaten, then I get sleepy.

Toqo-jiw nepa'ji'ji.

Then I take a nap.

Ta'n tujiw tugwiei, na 'ntiga'taqang naji-matu'lugwei.

When I wake up, then I go putter around in my garden.

Apaji-pisgwa'i, toqo engopa'si, aq egijjei.

I go back inside, then I sit down, and I read.

Glapis getugsiei.

Eventually I get sleepy.

Toqo-jiw gesispa'tuann nipitl.

Then I brush (lit. 'clean') my teeth.

Toqo-jiw naji-npai.

Then I go to sleep.

Toqo-jiw nepai.

Then I sleep.

  • Next Dialog→
